Description.Text: Other amenities/ services: Rooms with Telephone, fridge. Some rooms with kitchenette. **Swimming pool is closed from 01st of December to 01st of April** **From October to March: Reception hours 9 am to 1 pm. Open/Pick up the clients for check in, but hotel needs to know the arrival details**
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Located in a quiet area of Parikia - 500m, not in the seafront but close to the sea. Nearest Airport: 8km.
